aboutMarito.intro: Lefoko 'Marito' le tswa mo Xitsonga, le kaya 'mafoko' kgotsa 'maina'. Seno ke thulaganyo ya webe e e tsweletseng pele e e kopanego sekgala se se fa gare ga thuto e e humileng ya dipuo tsa Aforika Borwa le phitlhelelo ya sejoalejoale ya dijitale. Barati ba dipuo, babatlisisi ba NLP, le baitseanape ba dipuo ba ka dirisa Marito jaaka sethala se se kopanego go sekaseka, go tseya karolo, le go boloka dikhungolose tsa dipuo tse di farologaneng, dipukuntsu, le dipanka tsa mareo mo dipuong tse 11 tsa semolao tsa Aforika Borwa.
aboutMarito.mission: Marito e dira sentle mo teng le kwa ntle ga inthanete, e kgontsha setšhaba go fitlhelela didirisiwa tse di feletseng tsa dipuo, go neela maikutlo, le go dirisana go aga di-lexicons tse di nonofileng tsa dipuo tse di nang le didirisiwa tse di kwa tlase. Sethala seno ke karolo ya tiragalo e e tswelelang ya DSFSI (Data Science for Social Impact) kwa Yunibesithing ya Pretoria go dira gore didirisiwa tsa dipuo di fitlhelelege setšhaba sotlhe le go tsweletsa dipatlisiso tsa thulaganyo ya puo ya tlhago ya dipuo tsa Aforika.
aboutMarito.teamCredit: E agetswe ka ikgogomoso ke Velox
aboutMarito.learnMoreDSFSI: Ithute go le gontsi ka DSFSI

aboutMofoko.title: Ka Mafoko
aboutMofoko.content: Mafoko (a kaya “mafoko” ka Setswana) ke setsha sa dipuo tse dintsi se se rulagantsweng go keteka le go kopanya dipuo tse 11 tse di amogelesegileng mo Aforika Borwa.

whyMafoko.title: Goreng Mafoko e le teng
whyMafoko.content: Dipuo tsa Aforika Borwa ke tse di tletseng botshelo, tse di bontshang maikutlo, mme di golagane thata le boitshupo jwa rona, mme tse dintsi ga di a emelwa sentle mo lefatsheng la dijitale. Mafoko e tlhamiwe go fetola seno. E kopanya mafoko le dikatlego tse di tswang mo dikgobokanyong tse di farologaneng tsa mafoko go dira lefelo le le lengwe le le ka batlwang, le le dirang gore go nne motlhofo go feta go batla mafoko, go tlhaloganya diphetolelo, le go ithuta mo dipuong tsotlhe tse 11 tse di amogelesegileng.
whyMafoko.content2: Nngwe le nngwe fa o le mo inthaneteng kgotsa o sa hokaganngwa, Mafoko e dira gore kitso ya puo e nne gaufi le wena. E rotloetsa le tirisano, e letlelela ditlhopha tsa setšhaba go akanya ka ditokafatso, go abelana ka kitsiso, le go thusa go tokafatsa boleng jwa ntlha nngwe le nngwe ya mafoko ka metlha.
whyMafoko.content3: Ka go kopanya dithoto tsa puo tse di neng di phatlaletse gore e nne setsha se se phelang, se se golang, Mafoko e thusa go sireletsa boswa jwa rona mme e tshegetsa thuto e e akaretsang le patlisiso ya puo ya tlholego ya dipuo tse di nang le dithoto tse di kwa tlase.

whoMafoko.title: E diretswe bomang
whoMafoko.content: Baithuti, barutabana, bafuputsi, le mongwe le mongwe yo o nang le lorato mo puong le mo setso.

howMafoko.title: Tsela ya go dirisa Mafoko
howMafoko.content: O ka dirisa Mafoko go batla mafoko, go lekola mafapha a puo a a farologaneng, go lebelela diphetolelo, le go abelana ka maikutlo a gago go thusa go tokafatsa setsha seno.
howMafoko.help: Go bona tlhaloso e e feletseng e e nang le dithuto tse di khutshwane le difilimi tsa ditlhaloso, etela

behindProject.title: Kwa morago ga Porojeke
behindProject.content: Mafoko e tlhabolotswe ke setlhopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwa Yunibesiting ya Pretoria.

termsAndConditions.title: Melawana le Maemo
termsAndConditions.welcome: Rea go amogela mo Mafoko, setsha sa dipuo tse dintsi se se dirilweng le go tlhokomelwa ke sehlopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) mo Yunibesiting ya Pretoria. Ka go dirisa Mafoko, o dumalana le Melawana le Maemo a. Tsweetswee, bala ka kelotlhoko pele o tsena kgotsa o tsaya karolo mo setšhabeng seno.
termsAndConditions.purpose: Mafoko (a kaya 'mafoko' ka Setswana) ke setsha sa thuto se se seng sa kgwebo se se rotloetsang dipuo tse di le 11 tse di amogelesegileng mo Aforika Borwa ka go fa phitlhelelo mo dikgobokanyong tsa mafoko le didiriswa tsa dipuo tse dintsi. Setsha seno se tlhamiwe go tshegetsa thuto e e akaretsang, patlisiso le tirisanyo mmogo mo ditlhopheng tsa dipuo.
termsAndConditions.user: Go tsaya karolo mo Mafoko, jaaka go romela mafoko, go tlhopha, go tloga ditlhopho kgotsa go dira kopo ya go nna setsebi sa puo, badirisi ba tshwanetse go dira akhaonto. O dumalana go fana ka tshedimosetso e e boammaaruri le e e nepagetseng fa o ikwadisa, mme o boloke tshedimosetso ya gago ya go tsena e le sephiri. DSFSI e na le tshwanelo ya go emisa kgotsa go phimola dikonto tse di tlolang Melawana eno kgotsa tse di romelang dikateng tse di sa tshwanetseng.
termsAndConditions.contribution: Mafoko e letla badirisi go romela mafoko, diphetolelo, tlhaloso le maikutlo. Ka go romela dikateng, o neela DSFSI laesense e e seng ya boikgethelo, e e se nang tuelo ya go bontsha, go dira khopi gape, le go anamisa dineelo tsa gago mo Mafoko ka maikaelelo a thuto le patlisiso.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Dineelo tsotlhe di tshwanetse go nna tse di maleba, tse di tlotlegang, le tse di nepagetseng mo puong. Dikakanyo tse di kgetholang, tse di nyedisang kgotsa tse di se nang nnete di tla phimolwa, mme go boeletswa ga molato go ka felela ka go emisiwa ga akhaonto.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Badirisi ba ba batlang go nna ditsebi tsa dipuo mo setšhabeng seno ba ka dira dikopo ka go neela bosupi jwa diterata tsa bone tsa borutegi (jaaka direkhoto tsa Google Scholar). DSFSI e na le tshwanelo ya go tlhola le go netefatsa bokgoni pele e neela tlotla ya maemo a setsebi sa puo.
termsAndConditions.property: Setsha sa Mafoko, se se akaretsang moralo wa sone, sebopego le dikgobokanyo tsa mafoko, ke khumo ya bokgoni jwa DSFSI le Yunibesiti ya Pretoria. Mafoko le diphetolelo tsotlhe ke khumo ya bangodi le banei, mme di ka dirisiwa gape mo Mafoko ka maikaelelo a thuto le patlisiso jaaka go tlhalosiwa fa godimo.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Le fa Mafoko e ikaeletse go fa tshedimosetso ya dipuo e e nepagetseng le e e tshephegang, DSFSI ga e neele tiisetso mabapi le go felela kgotsa go nepahala ga dikateng. Setsha seno se fiwa 'jaaka se ntse' ka maikaelelo a thuto, mme DSFSI ga e ikarabelele ka diphoso, go tlhokega kgotsa dikgwetlho tse di tswang mo tirisong ya sone.
termsAndConditions.commercialTitle: Tiriso e e Seng ya Kgwebo
termsAndConditions.commercial: Mafoko e fiwa mahala ka maikaelelo a thuto le patlisiso. Ga go na dikateng tsa setsha tse di ka dirwang khopi gape, tsa anamisiwa kgotsa tsa dirisiwa ka maikaelelo a kgwebo ntle le tetla e e kwadilweng pele go tswa kwa DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: Mafoko ga e dirise dikukhi, go sala morago tshedimosetso kgotsa ditirelo tsa papatso. Tshedimosetso ya akhaonto e bolokilwe fela go dumella karolo ya modirisi le go tlhokomela tshedimosetso ya setsha. DSFSI ga e abelane ka tshedimosetso ya botho le batho ba bangwe kgotsa mekgatlho e sele.
termsAndConditions.change: DSFSI e ka ntšhafatsa Melawana le Maemo a ka nako nngwe le nngwe go bontsha diphetogo kgotsa ntlafatso ya maano. Go tswelela go dirisa Mafoko morago ga ntšhafatso go raya gore o amogela Melawana e e ntšhafaditsweng.
termsAndConditions.contact: Fa o na le dipotso kgotsa matshwenyego mabapi le Melawana le Maemo a, tsweetswee ikgolaganye le sehlopha sa Data Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) mo Yunibesiting ya Pretoria.

feedbackPage.success: e rometswe sentle. Re lebogela maikutlo a gago.
feedbackPage.description: Arolelana dikakanyo tsa gago go re thusa go tokafatsa tirelo ya rona.
feedbackPage.description2: Re itsise gore eng e sa dirang sentle gore re kgone go e tokafatsa.
feedbackPage.description3: Re tla itumelela go itse gore re dira sentle mo kae.

feedbackPage.suggest: Tlhalosa tshisinyo ya gago ka botlalo

feedbackPage.compliment: Re bolelele gore ke eng e dirileng gore phihlelo ya gago e nne ntle

termAdditions.content2: Kgetha mafoko a a netefaditsweng ke balaodi gore a tsenngwe jaaka diphetolelo:
termAdditions.deleteContent: A o tlhomamisa gore o batla go phimola tiriso eno? Tiro eno e ka se boe morago.

glossaryPage2.offlineMessage: Ga o mo inthaneteng - go bontshiwa data e e bolokilweng
glossaryPage2.noTermsFound: Ga go mafoko a a fitlhetsweng mo pukuntshung eno.
glossaryPage2.noTermsMatch: Ga go mafoko a a tshwanang le patlo ya gago.
glossaryPage2.exportMessage: Kopolola mafoko otlhe a a tswang mo go
glossaryPage2.exportMessage2: ka sebopego se o se ratang.
glossaryPage2.agriculture: Mafoko a a amang temo, go disa diphologolo, le ditsamaiso tsa tlhagiso ya temo.
glossaryPage2.construction: Dikakanyo tsa kago, didiriswa tsa kago, le taolo ya merero.
glossaryPage2.demography: Mafoko a botlhokwa a a tlhalosang ditlhopha tsa batho le dipalopalo tsa setšhaba.
glossaryPage2.education: Mafoko a a amanang le thuto, dithuto, le ditsamaiso tsa thuto.
glossaryPage2.energy: Dikakanyo tse di amanang le tlhagiso ya maatla le ditsamaiso tsa maatla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Mafoko a a tlhalosang tshireletso ya tikologo, tikologo le botshepegi jwa tikologo.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Dipalopalo tsa batho tse di akaretsang dingwaga, bong le go fuduga ga batho.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Dikakanyo tse di amanang le taolo ya dikgwebo, borakgwebo le tshedimosetso ya khampani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Mafoko a a amanang le mafelo, diporofense le go dira mmepe.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Dikakanyo le mafoko a a amanang le botsogo, boitekanelo, le dipalopalo tsa botlhokwa.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Dikakanyo tse di amanang le tekanyetso ya lelapa, ditshenyegelo le maemo a botshelo.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Mafoko a a tlhalosang dintlo, ditlamelo le ditirelo tsa metse tse di botlhokwa.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Mafoko a ikonomi a a tlhalosang kabo ya letseno, dipenshene le maruo a malapa.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Mafoko a a amanang le tlhagiso, kgwebo, le tlhabololo ya diindasteri.
glossaryPage2.labour: Mafoko a a amanang le badiri go akaretsa madi a a duelang, meputso le maraka wa badiri.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Mafoko a a tlhalosang tsamaiso ya molao, ditokelo le botsamaisi jwa tshiamiso.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Dikakanyo tse di amanang le tlhagiso ya diindasteri, ditsamaiso tsa tlhagiso le ditlhopha tsa phepelo.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Dikakanyo tsa ikonomi tse dikgolo tse di akaretsang GDP, letseno la bosetšhaba le dipalopalo tsa madi.
glossaryPage2.government: Mafoko a a tlhalosang sebopego sa puso, botsamaisi le mekgatlho ya setšhaba.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Mafoko a a amanang le palo ya batho le tshekatsheko ya dipalopalo tsa setšhaba.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Dikakanyo le dikai tse di lekanyang lehuma, pharologanyo le tlhabololo ya setšhaba.
glossaryPage2.prices: Mafoko a ikonomi a a tlhalosang ditlhwatlhwa, ditlhwatlhwa tsa bareki le maatla a go reka.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Mafoko a a tlhalosang dikgwebo tsa poraefete, matsete le ditiro tsa kgwebo.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Mafoko a a tlhalosang tekanyetso ya puso, lekgetho le taolo ya madi a setšhaba.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Dikakanyo tsa saense le thekenoloji tse di akaretsang dipatlisiso le boitlhomogi.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Mafoko a a tlhalosang boitekanelo jwa setšhaba, ditirelo tsa setšhaba le maemo a botshelo.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Mafoko a a amanang le ditlhokego tsa dipalopalo, metadata le ditsamaiso tsa data.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Dikakanyo tse di amanang le go boloka le go ntšhafatsa direkoto tsa dikgwebo tsa bosetšhaba.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Mafoko a a amanang le bohahlaudi, dithuto tsa boikhutso le dipalopalo tsa baeti.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Mafoko a a tlhalosang go tsamaya ga bahahlaudi, mekgwa ya go fuduga le phitlhelelo ya batho.
glossaryPage2.trade: Dikakanyo tse di akaretsang kgwebo, thekišo le kgwebo ya ditšhaba.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Mafoko a a tlhalosang dipalangwa, ditlamelo le marangrang a puisano.
glossaryPage2.glossaryError: Ga go na dikishinari tse di fitlhetsweng
glossaryPage2.bookmarkErrorDetails: Phoso e e sa solofelwang e diregile.
glossaryPage2.connectionError: Go bea letshwao go batla kgolagano ya inthanete.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Tsena o tsenele go bea letshwao mo dikishinaring.
glossaryPage2.Notranslate: Ga go phetolelo e e leng teng ya puo eno

termHelpPage.title: Go kwešiša Lentšu la Mmantšu
termHelpPage.intro: Lentšu la Mmantšu ke lefelong leo o ka le šomišago go nyaka ditlhalošo tša mantšu ka maleme a mantši mo malemeng a 11 a semmušo a Afrika Borwa. Le thekga go nyaka ka lebelo, go kgetha ka leleme goba lefapha, le go šomiša ntle le inthanete ge mmantšu e šetše e laeditšwe.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Lentšu la Mmantšu le go dumelela go nyaka ditlhalošo tša mantšu ka maleme a mantši a semmušo a Afrika Borwa.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Lentšu le lengwe le le lengwe mo Marito le na le dintlha tše di latelago:

termFields.language: Leleme: Le lengwe la maleme a 11 a semmušo a Afrika Borwa.
termFields.domain: Lefapha: Lefapha la dithuto goba sehlogo.
termFields.definition: Tlhalošo: Tlhalošo e hlakilego ya moelelo wa lentšu.
termFields.related: Mantšu a Amanago: Dikgokagano go mantšu a nago le moelelo o swanago goba o amanago.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: Marito e thekga maleme ka moka a 11 a semmušo a Afrika Borwa. O ka diriša dikgetho tša go kgetha gore o lebelele leleme le tee goba o nyake mantšu go tšwa go a mantši.
termHelpPage.searchSubheadingHow: Kamoo Go Nyaka go Šomago Kateng
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Mosebetsi wa go nyaka mo Marito o go thuša go hwetša mantšu ka lebelo mo malemeng ka moka a 11 a semmušo.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Ge o ngwala, Marito e dira nyako ya nako-ya-sebele gomme e mpshafatša dipoelo ka nako yeo.

searchFields.term: Lentšu: Leina goba polelo yeo e emetšego kgopolo e itšego.
searchFields.definition: Tlhalošo: Mantšu ao ditlhalošo tša ona di nago le mantšu a o a nyakilego le ona a tla tšwelela.
searchFields.filters: Dikgetho: Kgetha ka leleme goba lefapha.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: Marito e ka šišinya mantšu a amanago goba dikakaretšo ge o sa dutše o ngwala.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ka tlwaelo, Marito e dira nyako e nepagetšego goba e batametšego go nepahalo, eupša o ka bula nyako e sa nepahalago (fuzzy search).
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Mantšu a bontšhwa mo dikhating tše nago le leina la lentšu, leleme, lefapha, tlhalošo, le dikonopo tša go vouta.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Go fokotša dipoelo, diriša dikgetho tšeo di lego letlakaleng la nyako.

filtersList.language: Leleme: Fokotša dipoelo go leleme le tee fela.
filtersList.domain: Lefapha: Shebana le mafapha a bjalo ka Thuto, Bophelo, goba Theknolotši.
filtersList.fuzzy: Nyako e sa Nepahalago: Hwetša mantšu le ge go na le diphoso tša go peleta goba phapano.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Kgotla konopo ya 'Lebelela' khating ya lentšu go bula tlhalošo e feletšego gomme o hlahlobe mantšu a amanago.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: Marito e ka šomišwa ntle le inthanete ge mmantšu e šetše e laeditšwe pele.
offlineSteps: Kgetha mmantšu yeo o nyakago go e laolla.
Kgotla 'Laolla' go e boloka sešebeding sa gago.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Ka morago ga go laolla, mantšu a mmantšu woo a tla dula a le gona le ge o se wa hokela inthaneteng.

workspaceHelpPage.title: Go tlhaloganya Workspace
workspaceHelpPage.intro: Workspace e go letla go boloka mafoko le diglosari tse o nang le kgatlhego mo go tsone, go di rulaganya mo ditlhopheng, le go laola ditlhopha tseo. Ke kwa o ka salang morago ka teng kgatelopele ya ditlhahiso tsa gago tsa mafoko le go boloka dikwalo tsa gago tsa tiro.
workspaceHelpPage.groupsBody: Ditlhopha di thusa go rulaganya mafoko a a bolokilweng. O ka dira ditlhopha tse disha, wa di reetsa maina a mangwe, kgotsa wa phimola tse o sa di tlhokeng.
groupsSteps: Dira Setlhopha: Tobetsa konopo ya Setlhopha se Sesha, tsenya leina, tlhopha mafoko, mme o netefatse ka go tobetsa Oketsa Mafoko.
Tlotla Setlhopha: Tobetsa letshwao la pentšele fa thoko ga leina la setlhopha, fetola leina, mme o netefatse ka go tobetsa Fetola Leina.
Phimola Setlhopha: Tobetsa letshwao la go phimola, tlhopha ditlhopha tse o batlang go di tima, mme o netefatse.
workspaceHelpPage.moveTitle: Go Fetisetsa Mafoko Gare ga Ditlhopha
workspaceHelpPage.moveBody: Go fetisetsa lefoko go setlhopha se sengwe, tobetsa letshwao la go fetisetsa fa thoko ga lefoko mme o tlhophe setlhopha se sesha.
workspaceHelpPage.notesBody: Dikwalo di go letla go oketsa bokao mo mafokong a a bolokilweng. O ka dira, fetola, kgotsa phimola dikwalo mo Workspace.
notesSteps: Oketsa Lokwalo: Tobetsa letshwao la lokwalo fa thoko ga lefoko, kwala lokwalo, mme o tobetsa Boloka.
Fetola Lokwalo: Tobetsa letshwao la pentšele, fetola mafoko, mme o tobetsa Boloka.
Phimola Lokwalo: Dirisa kgetho ya go phimola go tima dikwalo tse di sa tlhokegang.
workspaceHelpPage.deleteBody: O ka tima dilo mo Workspace nako nngwe le nngwe:
deleteSteps: Phimola Lefoko: Eya mo Mafokong a a Bolokilweng, tobetsa letshwao la go phimola, mme o netefatse.
Phimola Glosari: Eya mo Diglosaring tse di Bolokilweng, tobetsa kgetho ya go tima, mme o netefatse.

settingsHelpPage.title: Dipehelo le Boikamahanyo
settingsHelpPage.intro: Sebelisa leqephe la Dipehelo ho fetola dikgetho tsa hao — ho kenyeletsa sehlooho, dintlha tsa profaele, le phihlello — ho etsa boiphihlelo bo botle ka ho fetisisa bakeng sa hao.
settingsHelpPage.modesTitle: Ho Fetola Pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Monyenyane
settingsHelpPage.modesBody: Mafoko e o dumella ho fetola kapele pakeng tsa mokhoa o khanyang le mokhoa o lefifi ho latela seo o se ratang le tikoloho ya hao. Tshebetso ena e fumaneha maqephe ohle mme e ntlafatsa sebopeho hang-hang ntle le ho sitisa mosebetsi wa hao.
modesSteps: Fumana Konopo: Batla letshwao la letsatsi/khoeli hukung e ka tlase le letsohong le letshoto.
Fetola Mokhoa: Tobetsa letshwao ho fetola hang-hang pakeng tsa Mokhoa o Khanyang le o Lefifi.
settingsHelpPage.profileBody: O ka ntlafatsa lebitso, imeile, kapa phasewete neng kapa neng ho tloha diphehong tsa profaele ya hao. Phetoho e nngwe le e nngwe e hloka netefatso bakeng sa tshireletso.
profileSteps: Ntlafatsa Lebitso: Tobetsa Fetola Lebitso, kenya lebitso le letjha, netefatsa ka phasewete ya hao, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Imeile: Tobetsa Fetola Imeile, kenya aterese e ntjha, netefatsa ka phasewete, mme o tobetse Boloka.
Ntlafatsa Phasewete: Tobetsa Fetola Phasewete, kenya phasewete e ntjha, netefatsa, mme o tobetse Boloka.
settingsHelpPage.accessibilityBody: Mafoko e fana ka dikgetho tse fapaneng tsa phihlello hore o ka ikamahanya le lenaneo ho latela ditlhoko tsa hao. O ka fetola puo, boholo ba mongolo, sebaka, le phapang ya mebala ka ho toba ho menu ya dipehelo.
accessibilitySteps: Fetola Puo ya Lenaneo: Bula lenane la ho theoha mme o kgethe puo eo o e ratang.
Bulela Mokgwa wa Phapang e Phahameng: Tobetsa High Contrast toggle ho fetola mokgwa wa mebala e pharalletseng.

leaningPathHelp.title: Go Utloisisa Ditsela tsa Thuto
leaningPathHelp.section1: Tiriso ya Learning Path e go letla go rulaganya loeto lo lo tlhomameng la go ithuta nngwe ya dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Aforika Borwa. Ka go tlhopha puo le didiriswa tse o batlang go ithuta ka tsone, o ka latela tsela e e rulagantsweng go na le go batla ka mokgwa o o sa rulaganngwang.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Tsela nngwe le nngwe ya thuto e kopanya di-glossary, didirisiwa tsa boitlhaganyo le go sala morago kgatelopele go go thusa go nna o kgothadiwa le go tswelelela.
leaningPathHelp.section3: Sebatli sa gago ga se tshegetse tag ya video.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Fa o sena go tlhopha puo, o tla kopiwa go tlhopha glossary. Glossary nngwe le nngwe e rulagantswe ka lefapha (Thuto, Bophelo, Thekenoloji) gore o tsepamise maikutlo mo mafokong a a botlhokwa mo go wena.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Fa glossary ya gago e setse e rulagantswe, o ka tlhopha tsela e o batlang go ithuta ka yone
leaningPathHelp.section7: Araba dipotso go lekola kitso ya gago le go matlafatsa se o se ithutileng.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Dirisa tlhahlobo ya mofuta wa dikarete go aga tlhaloganyo le go gopola mafoko ka lebelo la gago.
leaningPathHelp.section10: Go Ithuta ka Ditekanyetso le Dikarete
leaningPathHelp.section11: Go Sala Morago Kgatelopele ya Gago
leaningPathHelp.section12: Learning Path e sala morago tiro ya gago gore o bone gore o fitlheletse kae. Kgatelopele e bontshiwa mmogo le dipalo tsa setšhaba, go dira gore go nne motlhofo go nna o kgothadiwa.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Kopanya Ditsela tsa Thuto le dikgwetlho tsa beke le beke le dikgatlego go bona dibejane fa o tokafatsa bokgoni jwa gago jwa puo.

helpPage2.section2: Tataiso ya mohato ka mohato ya go hlama akhaonto, go tsena, le go sepela ka setšhaba lekgetlo la mathomo.
helpPage2.section3Desc: Ithute ka go romela, go tlogela ditlhaloso, le go šoma mmogo le ba bangwe o šomiša didiriswa tša setšhaba tša bjalo ka go fa ditlhopho le dipoledišano.
helpPage2.dictionaryDesc: Nyaka mantšu ka dipuo tše di fapanego, bulela patlo e e sa nepahalago, gomme o fetole dipeakanyo tša pukuntšu ya gago.
helpPage2.glossaryDesc: Rulaganya, hlopha, le go romela di-glossary ka sehlopha, lefapha, goba polokelo ya phetolelo.
helpPage2.workspaceDesc: Boloka le go laola mantšu le di-glossary tša gago, latela dikgopelo, gomme o šome mmogo o šomiša dingwalo le dihlopha.
helpPage2.settingsDesc: Fetola dikgetho tša bjalo ka mokgwa wa lesedi/kapa wa lefifi, dikgetho tša phihlelelo, dintlha tša profaele, le dipeakanyo tše dingwe tša modirisi.
helpPage2.homeDesc: Hlahloba mmepe wa Afrika Borwa o šomago, hwetša mantšu a a sa tlwaelegago, gomme o bone kakaretšo ya dikateng tše di kgethegilego.
helpPage2.dashboardDesc: Latela mešomo ya sethala ka digarafi, lebelela data, gomme o hlahlobe meneelo ya gago lefelong le tee.
helpPage2.learningPathDesc: Aga leeto le le rulagantšwego la go ithuta e nngwe ya dipuo tša semmušo tša Afrika Borwa.
helpPage2.feedbackDesc: Romela ditlhahiso, thoriso, goba ditletlebo go sehlopha go thuša go kaonafatša sethala.
helpPage2.faqsDesc: Dikarabo tša dipotšišo tše di tlwaelegilego ka ga sethala.
